mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_DIET_TYPE ( USER_ID, PROTEIN_TYPE, FAT_TYPE, CARB_TYPE, DIET_TYPE, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{dto.proteinType}, #{dto.fatType}, #{dto.carbType}, #{dietType}, NOW() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE PROTEIN_TYPE = VALUES(PROTEIN_TYPE), FAT_TYPE = VALUES(FAT_TYPE), CARB_TYPE = VALUES(CARB_TYPE), DIET_TYPE = VALUES(DIET_TYPE), UPDATED_AT = NOW()
